definition.text: Before we start data mining, I have a little question for you: are you trading at binance.com or binance.us?

paragraphs.text: If you trade at binance.com or don't trade with Binance at all, then you may skip this step and the next!
If you trade at binance.us you need to do something with the Binance node to the right! The video on the next step shows you how!
1. Open the configuration and change the codeName</br>to binanceus.</br></br>2. Edit the label of the node to read Binanceus.
